BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Maltese S. 2516 and Assembly Member Cymbrowitz A.5273, “An Act to amend the general municipal law, in relation to certain impairments of health presumed accidental or incurred in the performance of duty.”
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Amend the general municipal law, in relation to certain impairment of health presumed accidental or incurred in the performance of duty

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Marchi, S.4009 and Assembly Member Abbate, A.6942, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to permitting certain New York city sanitation members to borrow from their accumulated member contributions and to repeal certain provisions of the retirement and social security law relating thereto”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: AN ACT, in relation to permitting certain NYC sanitation members to borrow from their accumulated member contributions and to repeal certain provisions of the retirement/social security law

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Padavan, S.3217, and Assembly Member McLaughlin, A.6302, “AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the state finance law, in relation to the imposition of a mandatory surcharge on speeding violations committed within a work zone and the creation of a photo radar monitoring enforcement demonstration program”.
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: A mandatory surcharge on speeding violations committed within a work zone.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Marchi, S.5417, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.8372, “AN ACT to amend chapter 697 of the laws of 2004, amending the general municipal law relating to certain disabilities incurred by members of the uniformed force of sanitation departments, in relation to the effectiveness of such chapter”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Disabilities incurred by members of the uniformed force of sanitation departments.

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Golden, S.4530-A, and Assembly Member Abbate, A.7392-A, “AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to coverage for additional members of the New York city employees’ retirement system”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Coverage for additional members of the NYCERS.

Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor  -  “AN ACT to amend the business corporation law, the not-for-profit corporation law and the administrative code of the city of  New York,  in relation to the dissolution of a corporation responsible for the  payment of taxes to the city of New York.” A.7459 / S.5170
Items.ActionText: This Mayor's Message was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Dissolution of a corporation responsible for the  payment of taxes to the city of New York. (A.7459 / S.5170)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass a bill introduced by Senator Maltese S. 2516 and Assembly Member Cymbrowitz A.5273, “An Act to amend the general municipal law, in relation to certain impairments of health presumed accidental or incurred in the performance of duty.”
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Amend the general municipal law, in relation to certain impairment of health presumed accidental or incurred in the performance of duty
